main event: A UFO was observed by civilian and military personnel near Selfridge Air Force Base, Michigan on October 9, 1966.
interesting points: The UFO appeared to be like a planet, with a white color and a negative one or two magnitude.
The UFO moved across the sky in a definite direction, traveling directly over Selfridge AFB before making a 45-degree turn to the northeast and disappearing over the horizon.
The observation lasted for approximately 5 minutes.
The observers included a civilian tool engineer and a USMC navigator, both of whom were considered completely reliable.
The sighting occurred at around 0100Z on a clear night with visibility of approximately 10 miles.
